content.question: The monumental Buddha sculptures in the Longmen caves continued a tradition of similar sculptures that can be found farther west on the Silk Road in which of the following locations?

choices.label: Carved into cliffs in the Bamiyan valley, Afghanistan
As free-standing statues in temples in Lhasa, Tibet
Decorating gateways at Angkor Wat, Cambodia

content.answer: Carved into cliffs in the Bamiyan valley, Afghanistan
